stories.Title: Chromebooks are bad for sustainability
stories.Description: Google's laptop was a cheap go-to device for schools during covid, but only three years after their rise, they're already breaking and creating electronic waste due to their inability to be repaired.
stories.Tweet: Chromebooks are bad for sustainability 📦 Google's laptop was a cheap go-to device for schools during covid, but only three years after their rise, they're already breaking and creating electronic waste due to their inability to be repaired. #google https://www.engadget.com/chromebooks-short-lifespans-are-creating-piles-of-electronic-waste-063314306.html

stories.Title: New Mac models to be announced
stories.Description: A potential hardware update for Apple's Mac line may be on the horizon, as the company's Find My app for macOS contains references to three unknown Mac models.
stories.Tweet: New Mac models to be announced 📦 A potential hardware update for Apple's Mac line may be on the horizon, as the company's Find My app for macOS contains references to three unknown Mac models. #apple https://www.techradar.com/news/apple-drops-a-major-hint-that-new-desktop-mac-models-are-coming-soon

stories.Title: Google’s expansion plans are delayed
stories.Description: The tech giant's decision to pause the construction of its massive 80-acre campus in San Jose, California has raised concern among locals and investors.
stories.Tweet: Google’s expansion plans are delayed 📦 The tech giant's decision to pause the construction of its massive 80-acre campus in San Jose, California has raised concern among locals and investors. #google https://www.theverge.com/2023/4/21/23693474/google-san-jose-downtown-west-camps

stories.Title: AI keeps making its way into biotech
stories.Description: The use of AI algorithms in the treatment of diseases is generating high interest in the biotech industry, as it offers new possibilities for the development of life-saving medicines.
stories.Tweet: AI keeps making its way into biotech 📦 The use of AI algorithms in the treatment of diseases is generating high interest in the biotech industry, as it offers new possibilities for the development of life-saving medicines. #ai https://www.semafor.com/article/04/21/2023/curing-disease-is-the-hot-new-field-for-ai-talent

stories.Title: Generative AI is key to the production process
stories.Description: By making content faster and cheaper than humans, this technology is opening up exciting opportunities in the creative industry.

stories.Title: Don’t trust your accounting to ChatGPT
stories.Description: These research results are a sign of relief for people fearing that AI will take their jobs, as the technology is not intelligent enough to pass an accounting test yet.
stories.Tweet: Don’t trust your accounting to ChatGPT 📦 These research results are a sign of relief for people fearing that AI will take their jobs, as the technology is not intelligent enough to pass an accounting test yet. #ai https://www.thebrighterside.news/post/chatgpt-is-still-no-match-for-humans-when-it-comes-to-accounting

stories.Title: Auto-GPT is the future of AI
stories.Description: Autonomous AI agents are revolutionizing the way we approach complex tasks, thanks to their ability to chain together prompts and operate with little to no human interaction.
stories.Tweet: Auto-GPT is the future of AI 📦 Autonomous AI agents are revolutionizing the way we approach complex tasks, thanks to their ability to chain together prompts and operate with little to no human interaction. #ai https://www.forbes.com/sites/bernardmarr/2023/04/24/what-is-auto-gpt-a-next-level-ai-tool-surpassing-chatgpt/?sh=29bf4a2a3e8f

stories.Title: ARM puts its designs to the test with a new chip
stories.Description: The company has reportedly established a "solutions engineering" team to develop a more advanced semiconductor, with the goal of attracting new customers and showcasing its product capabilities.

stories.Title: Samsung's new AI-powered app
stories.Description: After being pulled out last year, the Galaxy Enhance-X app is now available for the Galaxy S23 series, bringing diverse AI-powered photography features to users.

stories.Title: Tesla teases new vehicles
stories.Description: A sustainability report from the automaker may be indicating that three upcoming vehicles are in the works: apparently, a compact car, a passenger van, and a bus.

stories.Title: Meet Estuary Flow
stories.Description: If you’re searching for a real-time data platform that's easy to use and doesn't require scheduling, look no further. This product is perfect for building no-code reliable pipes.
